revised_title: The Gyroscopic Mechanism of Diptera Halteres
tldr: This article investigates the gyroscopic mechanism of halteres in Diptera insects, specifically their role in maintaining equilibrium. The authors describe the structure and dynamics of the halteres, explaining how their gyroscopic properties function as a sense organ. They also discuss the differences in structure and effectiveness of the halteres in various Diptera families.
